QuestData.Title: The Beast Pens
QuestData.Description: I do not want to see another Zandalari beast rider breach our defenses!$b$bI have dispatched Scout Captain Daelin and some war mages to the Beast Pens northwest of here. Their mission is to infiltrate and harass the Zandalari siege and cavalry units. I want you to join them and lend your expertise.$b$bKeep an eye out for the tell tale shimmer of their magical cloaking spell.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Scout Captain Daelin at the Beast Pens.

Objectives.Objective: Find Scout Captain Daelin at the Beast Pens
